summary: Adds a good, lore-friendly home for the player in Riverwood. Good for new players, or someone who wants a small town home away from the big city
descriptionHtml:
Note: The house may appear very dark if you're using an ENB/Light Changer


DESCRIPTION

Adds a good, lore-friendly home for the player in Riverwood. Good for new players, or someone who wants a small town home away from the big city.

If you have ever wanted a place to stay in Riverwood, that wasn't too big, then this is what you've been looking for. 

FEATURES

Double-Bed
Tanning Rack
Safe Containers (Chest, 2 sacks, 2 barrels, 2 bedside tables)
Shower
Cooking Station 
Shrine (Akatosh)
Study Desk
Meal Table
Outdoor Table and Chairs

LOCATION

Just before the north gate of Riverwood

ENB IN SCREENSHOTS

Cinematic Lighting ENB - CLENB - by HD6
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4142//?

INSTALL

Just like any other mod, drop the .esp file into your Skyrim directory. 

Other than that, please enjoy!

PERMISSION

If you want to use the cottage in another mod, you're free to do say in anyway you'd like. Just give me credit.
author: VietCommunist
